rows.label: tev030502_MSG0001
rows.name: Ooohhh... The painnn... I hurt all over, you know...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0002
rows.name:
I need to drink miracle water before it's too late,
don't I?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Jalimbo that he looks a little green in the gills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have been in this dreadful of a state for a long time,
you know? My physician, Dr. Staccata, can't identify
the the cause OR provide a cure...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0010
rows.name:
I am in agony, so that is why I'm here to get some
miracle water, understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll even believe in some invisible miracle bringer if if
it means this pain will go away, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0014
rows.name:
Fraisie and the others who believe in the Bringer of
Miracles are passing out the water, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0015
rows.name:
Everyone says that one sip will get rid of of even the
worst of illnesses...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030502_MSG0016
rows.name:
I don't put much stock in gods or miracles, but if they
can make this pain go away, then I suppose I'm ready
to believe in anything?[ST:wait ]
